text:
At	first,	you	feel	a	fluttering	or	
bubbling, or a very slight shifting 
movement. This can feel a bit 
like indigestion. Later, you will be 
able to tell that it is the baby’s 
movements and you may even 
see the baby kicking about.
Sometimes you will see a 
bump that is clearly a hand or 
a foot.
Weeks 23–30
Your baby is now moving 
about vigorously, and 
responds to touch and sound. 
A very loud noise close by 
may make them jump and 
kick.
6 months 7 months
 8 months
Week 14
The actual siz
